definitions.example: Sleep in comfort with our new mattress.

definitions.definition: A consolation; something relieving suffering or worry.
definitions.example: We still have the spare tire? That's a comfort at least.

definitions.definition: A cause of relief or satisfaction.
definitions.example: The outcome of the peace negotiations in Moscow in 1940 was a heavy blow to the young nation, but in the same time a great comfort: at least the independency was preserved.

definitions.definition: To relieve the distress or suffering of; to provide comfort to.
definitions.example: Rob comforted Aaron because he was lost and very sad.

definitions.definition: To make strong; to invigorate; to fortify; to corroborate.
To assist or help; to aid.
